Title: HinshLabs
Description: HinshLabs is an entity for Research and Development of .NET frameworks, sites and applications that do something interesting.
HomeWiki:
HinshLabs is an entity for Research and Development of .NET frameworks, sites and applications that do something interesting. Sometimes these componenets will be fully fleged real-world solutions and others that will be pure R&D of the capabilities of the .NET Framework.

VSTS Projects - Visual Studio ALM
  • Tfs Work Item Seed Generator
  • Tfs Elmah Log v0.1
  • SQL Server and BIDS version Check in Policy
  • TFS Event Handler
  • TFS Sticky Buddy
  • TFS Task Timer
  • TFS Heat ITSM

.NET Projects - Microsoft .NET Framework

  • Wpf Behaviors
  • Command Line Parser v3.0
  • Command Line Parser v2.0
  • Command Line Parser v1.0
  • .NET Service Manager

WPF/ MVVM
  • Heat Calls Viewer

MOSS Projects - Microsoft Office Sharepoint Server
  • MOSS Designer Workflow Activities
  • MOSS Time Off Management

Windows Live Projects
  • Xbox Live Status
